title: Sviatoslav Richter
summary: Sviatoslav Teofilovich Richter[1] March 20 [O.S. March 7] 1915 – August 1, 1997) was a Soviet pianist who is frequently regarded as one of the greatest pianists of all time.[2][3][4][5] He is known for the "depth of his interpretations, his virtuoso technique, and his vast repertoire."[6]
